title: Shahs Of Sunset star Lilly Ghalichi and estranged husband are 'caught kissing'
text:
Lilly Ghalichi seems to be back together with her estranged husband Dara Mir after he filed for divorce in August.

On Monday new photos have surfaced of the two at their daughter Alara's first birthday party, which took place last week.

In the images, the Shahs Of Sunset stars are clearly seen kissing on the lips meaning the romance has returned.

Back on! Lilly Ghalichi seems to be back together with her estranged husband Dara Mir after he filed for divorce as new photos of the couple have surfaced

Divorce off? On Monday the photos were shared of the two at their daughter Alara's first birthday party which took place last week

The two were almost inseparable at the fun party.

They were not only seen kissing on the lips, but also smiling at each other and then arm in arm.

And he was there right by Lilly's side as they posed with their little girl.

Family photo: They were not only seen kissing on the lips, but also smiling at each other and then arm in arm. And he was there right by Lilly's side as they posed with their little girl

They went all out for her baby girl's first birthday party, throwing a 'glam carnival.'

She even donned a matching mommy-and-me princess dress with her daughter Alara, at the party that included stilt walkers and a ball pit.

The party held over a week ago, just weeks after he filed for divorce.

Kisses: They both planted a kiss on her cheeks as they doted on the little girl

The self proclaimed 'Persian barbie,' wore a pink princess-style dress with a full puffed tulle skirt, corset top and off the shoulder sleeves.

Her black locks were in a half-up half-down style. The top portion flowed into the hair behind her back and reached past her waist.

The Lilly Lashes founder had her makeup done by Kylie Jenner's makeup artist Ariel.

For the glam she had a full over drawn nude lip, pink eyeshadow and ultra fluffy lashes.

Mommy and me: She wore a matching princess dresses with her daughter in a pink style

Glam: For the glam she had a full over drawn nude lip, pink eyeshadow and ultra fluffy lashes, done by Kylie Jenner's artist Ariel

She paired her look with silver sky-high stilettos and diamond earrings.

Her one-year-old daughter wore a matching dress in the same style as her mom, from Ryan and Walter.

Mir, who filed for divorce in August after just two years of marriage, was seen with Lilly and their daughter at the event.

He was casual in jeans, a white button up and sneakers, as he posed with his family under a colorful flower arch.

Cherub: Alara was snapped by friends looking very angelic

Cutie: The beauty carried her baby girl during her birthday party

Friends: She shared a snap with her friends and each of their's children

The exes planted kisses on the side of their daughter's face at the same time, for a photo.

Alara's birthday party included a large snake, arts and crafts station and carnival like activities.

Held at Hollywood's Victorian-style farmhouse, Lombardi House, there was plenty of room for decoration.

Glamival: A sign outside declared it 'Alaras Glam Carnival' beneath a balloon arch

Welcome: Lilly welcomed guests under the balloon arch

Exotic: Lilly also shared a photo of her sister wrapped in a snake that was at the party

Venue:Held at Hollywood's Victorian-style farmhouse, Lombardi House, there was plenty of room for decorations and activities, including a juggler and stilt walker

There were plenty of extravagant decorations from balloon arches to huge flower displays.

At the entrance there was a sign that designated it 'Alara's Glam Carnival.'

The cake was a five tier, pink and gold round cake that had animals in the style of a merry-go-round at the top.

For the guests there was also another smaller three tier green and white cake.

Go-round:The cake was a five tier, pink and gold round cake that had animals in the style of a merry-go-round at the top

Decorations: There were plenty of extravagant decorations from balloon arches to huge flower displays

Showing off: Lilly flaunted her dress in the sun

There was also burgers with black buns and food packaged in pink to-go Chinese food containers.

On social media the former lawyer said 'Celebrating my daughter’s 1st birthday yesterday with so many people we love was magical.'

Though she warned fans 'Be prepared for some party feed spam the next few days!'

Tasty: There was also burgers with black buns and food packaged in pink to-go Chinese food containers

Artsy: There was a painting station for guests
description: On Monday new photos have surfaced of the two at their daughter Alara's first birthday party which took place last week. And they seemed very happy together as they kissed.
